articles.author: Tom Metcalfe
articles.title: Gold and jewels found on Minoan Island devoted to the color purple
articles.description: A storehouse of ancient treasures, including precious jewels and gold beads, has been uncovered by archaeologists on an island near Crete devoted to making a precious purple dye from sea snails thousands of years ago.
articles.content:

articles.description: The only thing that’s cozier than a warm fireplace is a plate of macaroni.

articles.title: Is the SAT Racist?: Lawsuit Says Test Should No Longer be Mandatory
articles.description: The University of California is being sued for requiring incoming students to take the SAT and ACT test. Plus, commentary by Gianno Caldwell.
articles.content: The University of California is being sued for requiring incoming students to take the SAT and ACT test as part of their admissions process. The lawsuit claims the tests violate California's civil rights laws by discriminating against disabled, low-income and… [+1002 chars]

articles.title: CBS affiliate's former weatherman possessed nearly 16,000 suspected child porn images, court papers allege
